content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I am looking for the highest possible price. What do you think would be a fair rental price for this space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: The apartment is in a good location and has a balcony. The price I am willing to pay is 600 Euros per month. Can you meet me halfway and accept 550 Euros per month?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 600 Euros per month, I am afraid that is not within my budget as a landlord. I would be willing to meet you halfway and accept 550 Euros per month, but that is the highest I can go. Is 550 Euros per month a fair rental price for this apartment in your opinion?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, that is a fair rental price for the apartment in Mannheim. I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, but I am willing to negotiate and compromise on the price. Can we agree on 550 Euros per month?

I understand that the apartment is in a good location and has a balcony. Is there anything else I should know about this apartment or the building it is located in?

I also wanted to know if there are any additional costs or fees that I should be aware of, such as utilities or maintenance fees.

Lastly, is this apartment available for the next year?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Hello Juan, thank you for your understanding and willingness to compromise. I agree to the rental price of 550 Euros per month.

As for the apartment, it is located in a prime area of Mannheim with easy access to public transportation, shops, and restaurants. The building is well-maintained and the balcony offers a beautiful view of the city.

Regarding additional costs or fees, the rental price includes heating and electricity, but not internet or phone. You will be responsible for paying for these services separately.

Unfortunately, the apartment is not available for the next year as I am planning to sell it. However, I can recommend other properties in the area that might interest you.
name: Heinrich Heine
